testcase.classname: User validation and Time sheet search
testcase.name: User validation
testcase.system-out: Given User should be on BeCognizant page....................................passed And user should have logIn successfully.....................................passed When click on search box....................................................passed And search for timesheet....................................................passed And select ESATimesheet.....................................................passed

testcase.name: Time sheet validation
testcase.system-out: Given User should land on Timesheet page....................................passed And print latest three weeks................................................passed When validate current week..................................................passed And validate previous week..................................................passed And validate week before previous week......................................passed Then close browser..........................................................passed
